channel.title: CVE Feed for ARI Soft -- ARI Fancy Lightbox
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ARI Soft -- ARI Fancy Lightbox

item.title: CVE-2024-47310|2024-10-06T11:29:57.164Z -- ari%20soft -- ari%20fancy%20lightbox
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ARI Soft ARI Fancy Lightbox allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ARI Fancy Lightbox: from n/a through 1.3.17.
